OOC: I am setting the pace for three new characters. Enjoy!

Hall of the Khans
Strana Mechty
Clan Space
3063

The dark-haired man clad in wolf leather rose swiftly and hit the 
marble desk hard with his fist at hearing the proposal.

"Are you mad, Khan Bjorn?"

The rumor of the shout echoed in the auditorium. Bjorn Jorgensson 
looked around him. Marthe Pryde of the Jade Falcons was also outraged, 
but the grins of both Perigard Zalman and Asa Taney rpoved that he had 
made a point.

Bjorn: Am I, Khan Vladimir? The battle fought and won by the Star 
Adders agaisnt Liao troops show that they have what it takes to take 
on the Inner Sphere. With a little time, every Clan could learn how to 
deal with our foe. After all, the Smoke Jaguars did not learn, and 
they are a dead Clan today. That is why every Clan should have a 
holding in the Inner Sphere.

Vladimir Ward glared furiously at the Ghost Bear Khan. The reasons he 
stated were only pretexts to weaken the Wolves and the Jade Falcons by 
having their worlds taken by the home Clans. The move would strengthen 
the Warden cause while creating a buffer for the base against attacks 
from the Draconis Combine. It was interesting enough for every Clan to 
take the bait, even knowing it to be a trap.
He would not allow it.

Vladimir: Very well. Let us vote on the subject.

As Kael Pershaw, the wrinkled and battle-torn Jade Falcon Loremaster 
pronounced the end of the vote, the result showed that only 4 of the 
28 Khans had voted agaisnt the proposal. They were the Wolves and Jade 
Falcons, as Bjorn had expected.

Vladimir: There Bjorn. You have your proposal. I hereby challenge the 
decision cast by this vote.

Bjorn: Just as I thought. I propose a trial by single combat. After 
all, we need not start a war about this matter...

The reference to the refusal war that had pitted the Wolves and Jade 
Falcons agaisnt each other a few years ago provoked a mild chuckle in 
the crowded Khans. Vlad simply let it pass.

Vlad: So be it. I shall stand for the opposants. Who will fight 
against me?

Bjorn let a smile creep up.

Bjorn: He is a man I trust with my life. He was once one of yours, 
Khan Ward. Since this will be a mech fight, he will go in my place. I 
hope he does not kill you... much...

(To be continued...)
